name: Tower Of Magi
description:
Tower of Magi.

An easy way to explain how this game will work is a dungeon floor type game main category is a new way of an RPG game. 
you will start in a small town lobby most of your game time you will be in this hub where you can craft items, armor and weapons and much more.
And then from there, you can enter the tower of magi where you will face monsters from all of the type of low and high lvl and et the end of every floor there will be a mini-boss or a boss. And from there you keep collecting items to craft get stronger for the other floors because the game will not be easy it will be a very grinding game so don't take it likely.

Now let me explain what will be in the game at the start of the first version of the tower of magi.

1. There will be around 8 floors in the first game so you can say 8 dungeons to play through it sounds small but it's not you will have a lot grinding to reach all 8 of them.
2. Crafting from armors and weapons.
3. 4weapons type. 
4. 4 unique hero's.

And so this is our first new game of 2019 with new systems implemented and new looks so I hope you guys will like this game so keep checking for more upcoming news. 

From Team CH-Gaming Studio
